org.raspberrypi.cecil.model.interfaces

Interface ModelInterface

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    Model

    public interface ModelInterface
    CECIL Application ModelInterface Implemented by Model.java Contains methods to be called from Model.java by the Controller The MIT License (MIT) Copyright (c) 2013 Southampton University group GDP9
    Version:
    1.2
